articles.title: Gullak Season 4 on SonyLIV: 3 valuable money lessons to learn from the series | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Season 4 of Gullak follows the Mishra family's heartwarming tales, highlighting the dynamics between family members and life lessons intertwined with money management, portrayed through relatable scenarios at work and home.
articles.content: Season 4 of Gullak brings more heartwarming tales of the Mishra family. The amazing Jameel Khan as the father Santosh Mishra, remains upright government employee; the incredible actor Geetanjali Kulk… [+5220 chars]
